org.commonvox.hbase_column_manager

Class MHBaseTestingUtility

  • Object
    • HBaseCommonTestingUtility
      • HBaseTestingUtility
        • MHBaseTestingUtility

  • public class MHBaseTestingUtility
extends HBaseTestingUtility
    IMPORTANT NOTE: This class only available with the HBase 2.0 (or later) implementation of ColumnManagerAPI; in pre-2.0 implementations, this class will throw UnsupportedOperationException.

    The MHBaseTestingUtility provides a ColumnManager-enabled extension to the HBaseTestingUtility.
    Author:
    Daniel Vimont
